abstract: The mortgage meltdown has made many Wall Street chiefs into punching bags in Washington. James Dimon, the head of JPMorgan Chase, has taken his share of criticism — but at least he’s able to joke about it.
lead_paragraph: The mortgage meltdown has made many Wall Street chiefs into punching bags in Washington. James Dimon, the head of JPMorgan Chase, has taken his share of criticism — but at least he’s able to joke about it.

headline.main: Dimon on How Wall Street Helped Create a Crisis

abstract: CNBC coverage of a speech by James L. Dimon, chief executive of J.P.Morgan Chase, in which he discusses the credit and lending crisis.
snippet: CNBC coverage of a speech by James L. Dimon, chief executive of J.P.Morgan Chase, in which he discusses the credit and lending crisis.

headline.main: J.P. Morgan's Dimon on Credit Crisis
